Unfortunately, only longswords have this unique strain of weapons, and there are miniseries of glaives within this set.
Mighty Glaive: Galaxy Chief
Bewitched Glaive: Receding Rust (Objectively Best), Bewitched Glaive: Blood Dance
Signature Glaive: Alleigance (Personal Favorite), Signature Glaive: Four Virtues, Signature Glaive: Fledgling (Nagi's blade)
Ethereal Glaive: Helldragon
These are all the unique longswords, as well as the only strain of weapon in the game like it. Sucks that these don't exist for the other weapons, I would have liked to see a unique javelin series. Something like "Shining Lance: Collapsing Star," or something nonsensical like that.

All of it. No, seriously, this is a 100% completion LP. He tends to play the story in relevant chunks, so after a certain arc ends, he does a lot of sidequesting, which can go on for episodes. Make no mistake, none of this is is tedious to watch at all cuz Chugga knows how to captivate the audience, and he's pretty good mechanically. Personally, I think that I watched his LP not for the game, but for the wit, charm, and humor of the commentary accompanying it.
